page.title: 17Interview with a P.R.O.
page.content: We talked to a public relations officer at{R.N.A.S,}one of the{3,000 people who work there.{200}are{Wrens (women).{778}people{live on the Base itself, the rest either buy or rent property locally. There is a large {married quarters estate}at{Northover. Most postings are for about{two years so there is a lot of coming and going. There are roughly{150 aircraft}on the Base.There is one take-off runway (7,000 feet long),one taxiing runway and a ski-jump whose height is altered to copy the angles of the ski-jumps on {H.M.S.Invincible and Illustrious,}the two aircraft carriers served by the Base. The{NAAFI}(Navy,Army,Air Force Institutes)feeds all personnel and offers an automat to wash clothes. The{museum}attracts up to 250,000 visitors a year.
